entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 12:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: ENE 43 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
